text: Goodou e helehelekai hagaamu goodou, bolo ma go goodou ne hai godou hagababa gi digau ala guu mmade, gei guu hai godou hagamodu gi di gowaa o digau mmade. Goodou e hai bolo goodou hagalee tale ang gi di haingadaa dela ma ga hanimoi, idimaa, goodou nogo gana gi nia kai dilikai mo halahalau dangada belee benebene goodou.
